website_summaries.verdict: An easy-to-use, dual-stage masticating juicer that boasts a 150-watt motor.
pros: Uses a low speed to keep the temperature down during extraction so juice lasts longer
Larger feed chute than similar models helps cut down on prep time
Performs other kitchen tasks, including preparing nut butters and grinding coffee and spices
cons: Ingredients can get sometimes stuck, so you have to alternate between soft and hard items to push softer ingredients through

website_summaries.verdict: This top-of-the-line product from a trusted brand will meet all your juicing needs and then some.
pros: An extra-wide chute cuts way down on prep work, and 5 end-cap settings make it easy to achieve maximum juice output and extraction
Can be used to extrude pasta, grind coffee and spices, make nut butters and milks, and more
cons: Its high price tag and large footprint are really the only knocks against this model

customer_reviews.title: Smoke from motor on first use!
customer_reviews.text: First time use and it started to smoke. No easy way to get support and as an international purchase, we will be hard pressed to send it back
customer_reviews.author: James Ong

customer_reviews.title: Attachment parts are cheaply made and break easily
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed in the quality of the components. With minimal use the screen cracked ( they said it was covered under warranty, but charged me for the replacement part) and now the black funnel piece broke off the feeder tube. Both times the parts broke I was just getting consistent in juicing and starting a cleanse....both times I couldn't continue due to failed parts. All the attachment pieces are cheap and flimsy and shake when turned on. I would love to get my money back so I can purchase a quality machine.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer Shanton

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This Juicer is not worth the hundreds of dollars. It doesn't produce much juice from fruits or veggies. It's a waste of money buying expensive organic fruits and veggies for the purpose of juicing when the juicer produces more trash than juice. I cringe looking at the small drizzle of juice that each fruit/veggie produces. Waste of money on both ends (buying this machine and losing out on your produce) If I could return this I would in a heartbeat. I'm super disappointed. Also while juicing the mastication piece wobbles so much as if it's going to fall off. Cheap plastics, not well put together. They are only able to sell this machine because of the Omega name. Nothing else.
customer_reviews.author: J. R

customer_reviews.title: This juicer is SLOW and doesn't produce much juice
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I would rather juice more often than have this cold press juicer. The juicer is so slow and only produces 1/2 the juice of a normal juicer and honestly having 72 hours to consume the juice is not worth the cold press painfully slow juicer. It took 1 hour to juice a bag of carrots and 2 apples. I wish I had the opportunity to return the product and purchase a different juicer but I was traveling abroad and when I returned the window for returns had closed.
customer_reviews.author: Jhart

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is just what I was looking for in a juicer. It is fairly easy to clean, and it’s easy to put together and take apart. I juice a lot of greens, vegetables, and fruits. I haven’t tried to make nut milk yet, but I’m excited that it comes with that feature. Straight out of the box it, looked very sturdy. Now, after months of daily use, with all kinds of hard and soft produce, I can honestly say it has worked beautifully without any difficultly. I can tell this juicer is a quality product, and it will last me many years.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy on a budget

customer_reviews.title: Very good yield on leafy greens and carrots
customer_reviews.text: Very good yield on leafy greens and carrots. I wish Omega wasn't so expensive. I absolutely love Omegas warranty. They are easy to deal with, just call them and they give you A email to upload picture of broken piece, and they send A new piece no questions asked.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Pitzer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a juicer that is easy to clean and this is it! There are a lot of parts but every single one is easy to clean and assemble. I have had the juicer for 3 weeks and use it every day, zero complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Justine Tovar

customer_reviews.title: Broken and Useless Warranty
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the juicer up until it died a month and a half into use. I tried to contact the company about the warranty but the company hasn't gotten back to me and it has been two weeks. Avoid this company like the plague based on my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Alex I Eklund

customer_reviews.title: What a joke
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a joke. I don’t know what most people are reviewing that give it 5 stars, maybe it makes good peanut butter, but it dose no juice well. It is very slow. I am very disappointed in the actual jucice it makes. The machine seam good quality but I get half the juice I used to get with my centrifical juicer. The screen area it so small there is no way to keep pulp out. Probably to get the most juice out you should clean the scream three or four times while you juicer. It came with a bunch of parts that there is no direction on how to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Sherman

customer_reviews.title: I will not recommend this machine
customer_reviews.text: Only after 4 months of used, the machine start making too much noises. It was really noiseless at the beginning. I worry that it may not last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Megne Kungne Linda

customer_reviews.title: This juicer is awesome. Was researching for months and this one kept ...
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is awesome. Was researching for months and this one kept coming up as one of the best in chat forums and articles online. I really love it and it’s super simple to clean. I was concerned about plastic parts but it has a 15 year warranty do who cares, just buy one if you want to juice veggies or fruit. Haven’t tried wheat grass yet but that’s next!!
customer_reviews.author: qualitydab

customer_reviews.title: Had my hopes up for this amazing juicer
customer_reviews.text: I researched this juicer a lot before I made the decision to buy it. This was the juicer I wanted and needed to follow my new lifestyle. If I was going to spend that much money on a new juicer I would expect it to work flawlessly. I had juicers before and kept upgrading them over time. I have been juicing for over 15 years. This juicer was unfortunately a big disappointment. It did not function as promised and kept leaking. It was a big clean up mess everytime. I tried adjusting the settings and tightening the seals. It still leaked. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Champion is better...
customer_reviews.text: Have juiced for 26 years. 50 pounds of carrots a month. This juicer is way more trouble to put together, takes longer to juice same amount of carrots, is harder to clean, and the juice has more pulp in it. My family didn’t like the juice unless I strained it. Took more carrots to fill my jars with juice too... so I must be getting less juice than with my champion. Going back to my champion and stuck with this purchase. Wish I could swap for the vertical model and try it😕. Too late for exchange or return. Kept wanting to like it but Got tired of the extra work and less juice...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Parts break easily and they are expensive to replace.
customer_reviews.text: Although, this is a good juicer, the parts will cost you a penny to replace. They are made of plastic and break easily for a very expensive juicer. Our screen has broke 4 times, even with fine cutting and care. Good luck with Omega's customer service. I say, if you want to buy an expensive juicer, make sure it will last, because this one is poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Coury Andrus

customer_reviews.title: Plastics Rub Together
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews on a multitude of juicers, I decided on this one. I can say that it juices great....dry pulp, lots of juice. The problem is that the auger wobbles when inserted into the base. This causes the auger to rub against other plastic parts and I started to see signs of wear after two juicing sessions. It may not be that big of a deal but I just don't feel comfortable with plastic in my juice. I didn't see any plastic shavings but if there's wear, then plastic is going somewhere. If you don't mind that, then this juicer is perfect. I'm sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: A waste...
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand the high ratings for this juicer. I read the manual and follow it's vague instructions to a tee. It gives me a fair amount of juice but by the time I strain out the pulp and foam I only get about half of that. I have digestive issues and juicing is the only way I can consume fresh fruits and vegetables. I am very unhappy that I paid so much for such a poor product. If this juicer is so highly rated, I have to wonder how bad the others are.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Time TG

customer_reviews.title: Cannot handle large batch of cannabis leaves and buds
customer_reviews.text: This juicer had many favorable ratings which is why I bought it. I juice fresh cannabis with it. Pros: Works very well for small batches and fruits. Easy set up and clean up. Dry pulp when juicer adjusted at proper setting. Cons: However, after 30 minutes of constant juicing it over-heats and shuts off on its own. Unacceptable for larger batches or commercial use. I will return this for different cold pressed juicer that can handle cannabis leaves more efficiently.
customer_reviews.author: cindy Ullman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent juicer
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is amazing I have been juicing for a few years and went through a few juicers this omega NC800 is by far the best and top of the line in the juicing world. Super easy to clean, powerful machine, very easy to assemble. The pulp was very dry which is excellent almost no pulp when straining minimum oxidation. Excellent for juicing greens,celery, wheatgrass, softer fruits are a bit tougher as you will need to use a hard fruit or veggie to help pass it through which is expected from this type of juicer. All in all this buy was well worth it you will not be disappointed. I highly recommend this model.
customer_reviews.author: Stef

customer_reviews.title: Product did not turn on straight out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Juicer did not turn on/work straight out of the box. It is extremely disappointing to spend this much money on a high quality juicer for it to not work and have to go through the process of returning.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: my omega juicer 800
customer_reviews.text: this item only lasted a month and i had to send it back to be repaired. That was two weeks ago, and i have not heard back from anyone. I am not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Tom VanDuyn,Jr.

customer_reviews.title: We love this juicer, be careful not to drop clear acrylic accessories!
customer_reviews.text: We love this juicer. Fairly quiet, extracts a very good amount of juice, and very easy to clean. My only complaint is for the clear acrylic accessories. Dropped the juice collector from counter height and it shattered. Oh, well.
customer_reviews.author: Laura W.

customer_reviews.title: Good juicer, but I'm Very disappointed how fast it broke
customer_reviews.text: I've used this model juicer for the past 4.5 years. After using it for 3 years (my former roommate had one and never had any problems) I have decided to get my own. But just after 1 year this part (shown on a picture) broke. I've tried to contact customer service but haven't got any response from them. Great juicer but horrible customer service!!! I finally got respond from customer service. Due to COVID it took a few months.. but my broken juicerpart has been replaced for free. And I'm happy again with my juicer! :)
customer_reviews.author: Kate Rina

customer_reviews.title: Love My Omega Juicer
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is great for roots and leafy greens. I also use it to make orange and pineapple juice, however, some it doesn't work for berries. Overall, I love my cold press juicer and the versatility. I've also used it to make almond butter and cashew butter, which do come out slightly dry and not as buttery as a vitamix, but you can add some coconut oil and get some nice textures out of the butter.
customer_reviews.author: Giosue D'Esposito

customer_reviews.title: Spendy but great.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried multiple juicers and this one has been the best by far. Clean up is way faster than with any of the other juicers. The only 2 downsides to the Omega are the price and the juicing speed. It's not super slow but it is not as fast as some of the other masticating juicers I have used. However, the clean up is so much faster that it makes up for being slow. It's a lot more fun to spend time juicing that cleaning the machine afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: You can juice just about everything. Delicious, convenient, and I don't have to cook.
customer_reviews.text: I love this juicer, man. I have juiced everything. Watermelon, Apples, Spinach, carrots, beats, lime, lemon, blueberries, and the list goes on. I have found that the juicer works better on green leafy vegetables and crunchier fruits than it does softer fruit like strawberries.For softer fruit, I like to use a little at time and follow up with something crunchy. None the less, this is a delicious way to get your nutrients every day. Who needs multivitamins when you can just juice everything?
customer_reviews.author: Pieisforme

customer_reviews.title: Quieter than any other powerful juicer I have used or seen
customer_reviews.text: We use this everyday. Cleanup is as easy as any other juicer. Looks and feels solid, has the power for what we need, and compared to our last juicer - which sounded like a jet engine - it is about 1/10th as loud. Mostly used for celery, apples, most other common fruits, and cucumbers, this is as good a product as there is. Might look a little high-end, but we think it is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: KTownsend

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing...grateful I was able to return it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the omega 800JDS for celery juicing because this juicer was recommended by medical medium, Anthony William. It is very cheaply made but what’s worse it that it is not efficient. Celery pulp comes out very damp so a great deal of juice is wasted. I am back to using my Vitamix and nut milk bag to make my celery juice. I get almost twice as much celery juice the vitamix way. Don’t waste your money on this juicer.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost... outstanding machine!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! Love this Omega Juicer. I did some research and decided to purchase the Omega, I made the right choice. It’s a nice sturdy machine, easy to use and all the veggies, fruit that I have run through the juicer has given me a great juice. I have bragged about this product to family and friends. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: David Ruize

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this machine two years ago from Amazon and have been using it at least five days a week. This juicer is easy to use, easy to clean, and makes great juice. With the attachments provided, you can make homemade peanut butter, and with frozen bananas and fruits you can make creamy ice cream textured treats just as if you had a Yonanas machine. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: robert campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great for juicing greens
customer_reviews.text: Great for juicing greens and all types of veggies and fruits. My only issue is that after the cup (that comes with the juicer) fills up with juice, It is time to clean the strainer inside. I would like to keep juicing without having to stop until I AM done, not when the machine needs cleaning. Nonetheless, I can still juice about 32oz before stopping to clean it. Overall i am very satisfied with my purchase. And the machine is very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: It seemed great to begin with (we've had this less than 30 ...
customer_reviews.text: It seemed great to begin with (we've had this less than 30 days). This particular juicer does not have a mesh filter over the container that catches the pulp. The instructions state that it is not necessary due to the juicers build. Sadly we are now getting lots of pulp through the juicing process no matter what settings we use, in particular cucumber pulp but others as well. Wish we had known this before purchase as we would have gone another direction.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished didn't perform to the same standard as new!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product refurbished and I would not recommend it. I've been using this item for two years and it wasn't till I stayed with a friend who has the same juicer and it takes half the time to juice and didnt back up once where mine backs up every time I use it and is way less efficient at juicing. I'm so frustrated that the product that Amazon said would be the same as if I bought it new was actually wasting my time and groceries for two years. Don't buy refurbished from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Jody M. Farnsworth

customer_reviews.title: Great for juicing greens!
customer_reviews.text: I love this juicer! After careful research I knew I wanted something easy to clean that would juice greens, and fruit. It does a great job if you alternate greens with softer fruits and the juice tastes amazing. It will not do a great job if you are only juicing a lot of really soft fruit without alternating harder veggies. (The auger gets clogged and you have to stop and clean it.) I had a Jack Lalaine juicer before and this one is far superior and much easier to clean. The larger shoot also makes prep time easier. Well worth the money! It is pretty quiet too!
customer_reviews.author: Julie B

customer_reviews.title: Great yield, affordable price, and easy to clean! Good quality juice!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research prior to purchasing a juicer (since they’re expensive) and I decided to go with this model. Although I really wanted to purchase the Green Star Pro, I decided to go with this one because the price is doable and it is great for what you get! I bought this so that I can make my own peanut butter, almond butter, and almond milk and I also use it to juice wheatgrass, cucumbers, and celery. I love it! It’s quiet, easy to clean (dishwasher friendly), and it has amazing yield! You’ll love this, I promise!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great juicer! Whole carrots, big chunks, don’t have to spend time cutting things up into small pieces... we have 2! Travel one and one that lives on the counter!
customer_reviews.author: Erik Falkenstrom

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, works well for celery not good if juicing very hard vegetables
customer_reviews.text: I loved this juicer the first few uses for celery, unfortunately the plastic juice receptacle cracked right down the center after hand washing on the second use. The instructions say everything is dishwasher safe, however I hand washed all parts to be safe. I made the mistake of juicing turmeric which this machine should be able to handle, it juiced well but left the macerating arm very sticky and after cleaning never worked correctly again. Now I can't even juice a few stalks of celery without the pulp getting caught on the macerator. I just passed the 30 day return window, I am hoping the company is reputable enough to honor a return. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer, worth the higher price tag!
customer_reviews.text: Love this juicer! I've had lower quality juicers before, and didn't use them as much as I use this one, because the Omega is easy to assemble, easy to clean, and works great! There was a crack in one of the containers that were included upon arrival. It didn't go all the way through, and it was usable...but figured I should call the company, just in case it was damaged further with use. They were very pleasant to deal with, and immediately rush ordered me another container. So impressed with this product and the way they stand behind their products. Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Savage

customer_reviews.title: Scratched when we got it.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know about the product itself but the product wasn't cheap and came scratched on alot of the parts. We are worried about it working with the scratches because it might be used or beat up on transit. I will update about the actual product after we use it.
customer_reviews.author: RoscoeKoopa151

customer_reviews.title: Juice to health!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this juicer for a couple of months now and absolutely love it. A lot of research has gone into finding a cold-press juicer that doesn't burn the nutrients through heat generated by other types of juicing machines. I agree with the reviewers who say that this juicer extracts juice really well. The pulp is bone dry for vegetables. For fruits that are meatier (e.g., pineapple, lemon), it is wetter, but still manages to extract a crazy amount of juice. Let's see how long this machine lasts.
customer_reviews.author: auggie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way
customer_reviews.text: This is my first juicer—so, I can’t truly compare it to any others out there, however, this definitely does what it’s expected to do. Through researching other brands, I came across this one to serve the purpose of the kind of juicing I was seeking to do. I’m very happy with my purchase—it’s also an investment towards my health. It is extremely easy to clean...there are 4 parts that off and this streamlines the process. I’m glad I have it!
customer_reviews.author: CurvyFit

customer_reviews.title: Simple but powerful juicer
customer_reviews.text: I love this juicer in that it is really quiet but powerful. I use this a lot. Product customer support is also amazing. It only took one call when I needed help with one of the parts and they were really quick to respond. It's also easy to clean. One thing I noticed, after using it for some time the vegetable juice stains the plastic parts. I'm going to have to figure out a way how to clean those stains perhaps give the company another call as to what they would recommend. Other than that this product really performs and I've got no negative comments on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Product Trekker

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Juicer does a incredible job. It works great on kale, dandelion, beets, lemons, carrots. I was concerned about the plastic parts, however the pieces are well made and solid. I literally can clean the dirty accessories in about 2 min. Just running the parts under hot water does the trick. The screen washes very well and no scrubbing so far with a brush. Ive used the unit for the past two weeks every day and no issues. I definitely recommend this product for the price and warranty.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Made thousands of juices with this Omega!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this juicer. I owned it for over two years and have made thousands of juices with this Omega. I own a small juice business and this juicer has made 50-150 juices multiple days a week with no issues. I will definitely buy this brand in the future when I need a second juicer to keep up with business:)
customer_reviews.author: amanda loy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I use it specifically for celery. I am concerned how the soft rubbery sealer will hold up over time but otherwise I have no complaints, the juice extracts very well and the pulp is pretty dry. I'll be back if there are problems,
customer_reviews.author: Birdie

customer_reviews.title: This is hands down the best kitchen appliance we have bought
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best kitchen appliance we have bought! I make green juices 5 mornings a week and nut butters are so simple too! I cut my veggies and start the hot soapy water in the sink. I just let all the parts soak while I drink my juice. Such a simple clean up. It " chews" the kale and collards easily and leaves the pulp so dry. The chute is plenty big, and the attachments are user friendly. We did a lot of research on juicers and masticaters and I believe this was the perfect choice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Versatile
customer_reviews.text: We looked at a lot of juicers and what I liked most about this one is that it uses BPA free plastic. It is very durable and will masticate anything. One thing that I did notice is that it is best to put in the softer produce first and then the harder items like carrots or beats (uncooked). I saw some reviews say no foam but I have seen some foam. To eliminate some of the foam it is best to put a strainer over the juice receptacle. I give this product a 4.6 out of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this juicer
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can do carrots with this juicer, but I think it could be improved. This item is not good with berries. Sometimes the berries do not make it thru the auger and all they back up into the shoot [not sure what it's called. Also, the fiber gets thru into the juice. It is easy to use, and it is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Highest recommended, versatile
customer_reviews.text: This machine juices everything, including wheatgrass. The slow,mmasticating process preserves enzymes that other machines destroy. It is quick and easy to take apart and clean. It was recommended by Hippocrates Institute and members of a raw vegan group, and I found it to be everything they said it would be. It is easy to clean and disassemble, and it works great. This is the only machine I know of that will juice wheat grass as well as everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Janice S.

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased with this one
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time researching buying a juicer especially since the cost is so high. I am pleased with this one, although there are times when it backs up and you have to take it apart and clean it before you are finished. But we juice about 6 bottles at a time. It is very easy to disassemble and clean and I like how well it is made. It is loud though. If you are thinking about juicing there are some great video reviews on youtube to help you pick which one is right for you.
customer_reviews.author: Vessel2

customer_reviews.title: Great Juicer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a present for my girlfriends mother who had breast cancer and was going through chemo. She needs to drink and eat nothing but healthy solids and liquids. This thing has been running for about 8 months now with no problems and cuts EVERYTHING down and juices it
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: agar not grinding as well after 8 months
customer_reviews.text: Warranty is over as well as product support at 8 months... Produce sticking to agar and staying in tube, not moving through. Juicing is slower and slower. I have to keep pushing it. Not working.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne C.

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases I ever made.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I ever made. This is must have for your kitchen. I did not know what am I missing until I replaced my old juicer. This is a money well spend.
customer_reviews.author: mr. Y. G.

customer_reviews.title: That extracts all the minerals when making juice and the pulp comes up dry 98%
customer_reviews.text: Everything about the product is the best to use and to clean ever.
customer_reviews.author: Prince

customer_reviews.title: It’s all important
customer_reviews.text: the easiest to operat .best to clean of all I know of. Adj head aids in the ability to process the softer red apples.yes it cost a little more than a lot of others .All I can say is you need to be more afraid of not spending enough the First time to avoid having to buy another after the cheaper one doesn’t work well and is difficult to clean. Go to juicer u tube web sites.Happy shopping good luck Re her it has a 15 year warranty
customer_reviews.author: Sherry McArthur

customer_reviews.title: Awesome juicer!
customer_reviews.text: It has met my expectations! I have some friends who have juicers and they sit stored in a cabinet or the garage because it's so time consuming to clean just to get a glass of juice. This literally takes a few minutes to clean. That was important to me. It's juiced everything I've tried so far. We keep ours right on the kitchen cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious juice! Easy to assemble and was! Five stars!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Easy to assemble and take apart... plastic is very good quality and parts are super easily washable. Juice is delicious and fresh tasting... no foam! I bought a different brand before and ended up returning it. This one is a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this juicer....this is the best one.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite juicer, looks great and works fantastic.... Great quality and I love the warranty on it. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mortimer

customer_reviews.title: Love This Juicer
customer_reviews.text: I'm enjoying my juicer. I replaced a centrifugal juicer with this one and I haven't looked back. It's quiet, strong and very effective. I'm also very impressed with the ease of use and quick clean up. My first juicer was literally 1/4 the price of this one but with a 15-year warranty and it's production, I'm more than content.
customer_reviews.author: Music Man

customer_reviews.title: Great Juicer
customer_reviews.text: This is a higher version of my existing Omega Juicer (8005). The construction is solid and attractive. The juicer does work as described. Its biggest plus is its ability to extract maximum juice from carrots, celery, parsley, ginger, apples. Second extraction/ Pressure tool is great and easy to adjust. All parts are easy to disassemble, clean and reassemble. Even though the feed throat is larger, wish it could be made even larger, so there will be fewer pieces to feed. But it is not a big issue We love it.
customer_reviews.author: ARIF SAEED

customer_reviews.title: Juice for life
customer_reviews.text: Had this for over a month now and I can say it does everything as advertised. We opted to go for this model vs. the fake metal chrome version, as that is really the only difference. Change your life and eat better with this Nutrition Center form Omega. After ready and researching hundreds of reviews and health blogs, this is the one you want to get.
customer_reviews.author: NapaFamily

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! True it doesn't work like one with centrifugal action on soft fruits but it will flat "go to town" on veggies! Really nothing new to add to other reviews. Only 7 (I think) parts to wash, all larger plastic pieces. Only 1 tiny section of screen to use a little brush on. Would be nice if they could go into the dishwasher but really soooooo much easier to clean than the Omega centrifugal one I had 20 years ago! Expect this baby to last and last!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Juicer!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! It's awesome! Making carrot juice is a breeze. I buy the 2lb bags of organic baby carrots from Costco (4 bags at a time). They're already cut and peeled. This juice is so sweet and so healthy! One of my next projects will be to grow and juice wheat grass. I will probably mix the wheat grass and carrot juices together at times.
customer_reviews.author: LuvEarth

customer_reviews.title: My brother is very happy with this Omega
customer_reviews.text: I paid good money for this Omega, but I am not regret it at all. My brother is very happy and told me that this Omega was the best ever.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Torres

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a first-time juicer (after spending $12/day for cold-pressed juices at health food stores for many years) and I absolutely love this product. Easy to assemble, works great on both soft and hard fruits & veggies, easy to disassemble, and the parts are SO easy to clean (light rinsing, then into the dishwasher). The juices that are produced are just as good or better than the ones I used to buy from the health food stores. This is one of the best purchases I've made in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought this juicer to juice all the difficult greens that require a heavy duty workhorse capable to handling the load. I have learned to alternate kale and celery with spinach and leafy greens. This whole process has made this task one of the easiest ever. The clean up is so simple. My only complaint is the size of the tube to process the greens especially with smaller pieces like spinach. Overall, I am very happy with this machine. The investment was definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Anne McWhite

customer_reviews.title: Best juicer ever!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this. It's easy to use, super easy to clean, very quiet and efficient. I made a wonderful, healthy ice cream with it tonight! It juices everything, even grasses and herbs. I highly recommend it to anyone who is looking for a fantastic juicer that you'll actually use (because it's not a hassle to assemble or to clean)! I haven't tried making pasta or bread sticks yet, but I hear that also works well.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Jo

customer_reviews.title: So thankful for a reliable juicer
customer_reviews.text: This juicer works great for all the different fruits and veggies I throw at it! I do a ton of celery everyday, and it is very dependable - I haven't had any issues. It is fairly easy to clean - just make sure you have a brush to use on the mesh portion - otherwise it takes no time at all. And it's great that I can throw it all in the dishwasher every couple days! This is one kitchen appliance I can't live without.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OMEGA JUICER
customer_reviews.text: I just love this juicer. I wish I had bought it years ago. So east to clean up (2 to 3 minutes). The assembly and dis-assemble is so quick and easy. I make long slender sourdough rolls (I love to braid the round strips together). I use this machine, sometimes, several times a day. The handle makes it so easy to move. This appliance is worth the money, ten times over.
customer_reviews.author: SIS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect juicer for me
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have purchased this years ago. But I waited for a sale. This juicer does not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: K. ball

customer_reviews.title: I love my juicer!
customer_reviews.text: Juicer produces so much juice, and is easy to clean. This was a great investment in my health.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Cox

customer_reviews.title: The best juicer!
customer_reviews.text: It's quiet, easy to assemble and take apart. It makes a lot of juice. The best investment I made.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: My first time using this kind of device, it works perfectly. Little noise, easy to clean, many recipes available :)
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Cespedes R

customer_reviews.title: It's definitely not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It started leaking the first month, plus the screen cracked in 3 months. Juices well but it's a horrible juicer for the price because it will last probably 4 months then you will need another. So you're better off buying a cheap one😡
customer_reviews.author: m.henderson

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer.
customer_reviews.text: Great juicer. I use it every day. It takes less than five minutes to clean. The separated pulp is very dry, so it extracts more juice than a centrifugal juicer. Plus, less foam than a centrifugal juicer.
customer_reviews.author: James Reid

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PRODUCT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best to extract the juice from the green leaves, it extracts a lot of juice from everything you put it in, besides you can really feel the taste of each fruit very different from others, the fiber comes out super dry, excellent quality, love it!!! If there were 10 stars I would give them to it, super happy with my purchase🥰😃
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Love this juicer
customer_reviews.text: Love this juicer! I can get quite a bit of juice from spinach, kale and other leafy greens. Handles carrots and harder fruits just fine. Has some foam on top, but not as much as my other juicer did. Juice tastes great! And VERY easy to clean. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Farris

customer_reviews.title: Cracking /broken parts
customer_reviews.text: I bought this juicer back in 2015 and decided to spend a little more due to the reviews and that it is supposed to be top of the market. My husband uses this daily and we needed a high quality machine. However, the cone piece has cracked down the middle and is not longer usable. I wouldn't expect any of the parts to break when we paid as much as we did for this machine. It would have gotten 5 stars, but I am disappointed for what we paid we are already having issues with the parts.
customer_reviews.author: VZ

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: The best thing that ever happened to me love it, u can do some much with this.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Juiciest juicer juicing
customer_reviews.text: Works as it should. My only complaints are that juicers are way to expensive for what they do ALL OF EM! And this one particular wish it came with a screen for your juice catcher to help catch unwanted pulp with some fruits an veggies that produce a bit more pulp than others do. Besides that it does what it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Best juicer out there!!
customer_reviews.text: Best juicer out there!!! A bit of a pain to clean, but easier than others I've used. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Loupita

customer_reviews.title: Great decision...great juicer!
customer_reviews.text: So far I love it. I had been thinking about switching to a masticating juicer from my centrifugal for a while now. Read through all the reviews I could and decided on this model of the Omega. I can say that I am thrilled so far with my decision. I am getting about 40% more juice than I was with my centrifugal. The juicer is so quiet and clean up is a breeze! Will see how it holds up over time but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Castellaneta

customer_reviews.title: Great Juicer
customer_reviews.text: Have had for a few months now and love it. Works better than any I have had. Easy to assemble and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Terry L Schaum

customer_reviews.title: GREAT service! I am looking forward to using this ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on reviews and what I want to juice. Mainly greens and harder veggies. After using once I noticed a hairline crack in the auger. I found Omega's warranty page, snapped a picture of it and US customer service is sending me one FedEx. GREAT service! I am looking forward to using this and will update.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno W

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I've ever made in my life! This is a true quality product with a real warranty! I feel remarkably healthier in just five days of juicing. Juicing has replaced my morning coffee and leaves me with even more energy than coffee ever did without a caffeine crash.
customer_reviews.author: PeaceBeTheJourney

customer_reviews.title: Pricey.
customer_reviews.text: A bit slow but finally gets it done. Easy to assemble and clean. So far no complaints except for price and should extract a bit more juice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: jvm

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer!
customer_reviews.text: I am not a juice recipe whizz at all, but this machine makes it easy. I wanted to start a healthier diet for me since time is always of the essence. Can get the vegetables cut, processed and equipment cleaned up, In less than 20 minutes in my morning routine. Best of all, the machine is so quiet it doesn’t even wake the baby. Happy customer right here!
customer_reviews.author: Busy Auntie

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR CELERY AND EVERYTHING ELSE! A lot of juice for a little bit of fruits/celery.
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is exactly what I was looking for! It juices fruits and celery PERFECTLY!!! The pulp is dry and you get a lot of juice for the amount of fruit/celery that you use! Worth every dollar!
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Vieira

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Clean & Use
customer_reviews.text: I love this juicer. It’s is easy to clean & use. I have a $2,500+ Norwalk Juicer but rarely use it because it takes so long to use & clean. This Omega produces great juice & is super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice blender, great on leafy greens,  but it pooped out on me less than 3 and 1/2 years in!
customer_reviews.text: I generally liked this blender and have used it quite a bit over the past 3 years. Sadly, it has pooped out on me less than 3 and 1/2 years in. I purchased the 3 year insurance and of course it didn't poop out until 4 months after the insurance has expired. For such a pricey appliance, I would expect it to last longer. So take this as a warning folks!
customer_reviews.author: T. Bills

customer_reviews.title: Great juicing investment!
customer_reviews.text: This machine is everything I wanted in a juicer --not too loud, easy to use and the juice is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FAST and Effective
customer_reviews.text: I juice celery and wheat grass and this juicer does both easily and quickly. Easy to assemble and comes with attachmenets for multi-use. Wide chute accommodates lots of veg for juicing. Disassembling and cleaning is a breeze. Best juicer ever.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine
customer_reviews.text: So awesome I bought another for a daughter who juices. It's a great product - easy to use, easy to clean, and something that makes you feel better! Use it every day instead of blending for more juice and less foamy product.
customer_reviews.author: Casual Guru

customer_reviews.title: Definitely yields more than my old juicer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great juicer. Bought it to start juicing wheat grass. I just received it and decided to do my own review of it by using my current juicer then running the pulp through the new one. Definitely yielded more than 35 to 45 percent more juice.
customer_reviews.author: Cpt4k9

customer_reviews.title: Still loving it!
customer_reviews.text: What a great juicer. Can juice all my leafy greens. I personally can't stand salads, or eating certain vegetables raw, but for some reason, in juice form, I can get it down! Maybe because its like a quick swig of vitamins and its over, not a 30 minute process of eating an entire meal that is so healthy it does't taste good.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Can't get enough.
customer_reviews.text: It is, by far, the best juicer. Does not make noise, easy to assemble and clean, but the most important it squeezes the heck out of every fruit, vegetable, herb, etc. It's practical, user friendly and made of quality materials. It's money well spent. Happy juicing!
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic machine, VERY quiet and SOOOOO easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: This juicer has changed my life! This is far better than a centrifugal juicer and the added cost of this machine is made up for very quickly due to its higher efficiency. I get more juice out of this machine, it's VERY easy to clean (60 seconds and your done!) and is so quiet that you can hardly hear it running. Thank you Omega!
customer_reviews.author: PRSPlayer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful juicer!
customer_reviews.text: We use this juicer almost every day - nothing it can't handle (except pineapples). Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Alan K

customer_reviews.title: Best Value for the Money! Strong Recommendation.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned four or five juicers in my life. The Omegas are the best by far, and the NC-800HDS is my personal favorite. The juice yield is great, it’s easy to assemble and it’s exceptionally easy to clean. Throw on top a 15 year warranty by Omega, and you’re doing great. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Reginald Cape

customer_reviews.title: Never purchase a used machine again
customer_reviews.text: Never purchase a used one .Missing lots of components in the package.
customer_reviews.author: yen

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: A must have if you think you want to lose weight!
customer_reviews.author: aBDALLA

product_meta.title: Omega NC800HDS Juicer Extractor and Nutrition Center Creates Fruit Vegetable and Wheatgrass Juice Quiet Motor Slow Masticating Dual-Stage Extraction with Adjustable Settings, 150-Watt, Silver
product_meta.description: Omega's Nutrition Centers are "masticating-style" juice extracts and more. A masticating juicer juices at low speeds of 80 RPM minimizing heat build-up and oxidation. The auger system forces produce into a tight chamber, grinding and pressing the food to squeeze out the juice from items as fine as wheatgrass and leafy vegetables. With a Nutrition Center you can also make all-natural nut butters, baby food, soy milk, almond milk and a variety of healthy snacks. Includes 6 nozzles and 2 Juicing screens.
feature_bullets: INDUSTRY LEADING 15 YEAR - Coverage on parts and performance
LONGER LASTING JUICES - Using a low speed of 80 RPMs results in minimal heat buildup and oxidation promoting healthy enzymes
HEALTHY AND DELICIOUS JUICES - Extracts the maximum amount of nutrients, vitamins, taste and juice from minimum amounts of fruits, vegetables, leafy greens, and wheatgrass
NUTRITION CENTER - Extrude pasta, grind Coffee and spices, turn nuts into nut butter, make baby food and frozen desserts, mince herbs and garlic, and whip up soy milk in a flash. Voltage: 110-120V
HIGHLIGHTS - The adjustable end cap has settings for maximum juice output and extraction. Enjoy continuous juicing with automatic pulp ejection.
POWER - Quiet but powerful motor with gear Reduction equivalent of 2 HP motor.
PREP - The size of the feed chute is larger compared to some omega models, so you can spend less time prepping before juicing
110/120 Volt model designed exclusively for use in North America. Coverage valid in North America only.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars921 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
